column4: Is there any benefit for using the K7 kernel over the 386? I have an athlon 64.
So K7 is a little bit better.. Perhaps I'll give it a try.
with an athlon 32, i haven't seen any difference speed wise. plus, i have seen problems with power management and nvidia drivers when using the k7 kernel
you can change terminal keycombos using Edit > Keyboard Shortcuts ...
